props.name: id
props.description: Gives a unique id to the anchor-link

props.name: htmlMarkup
props.description: Changes the underlying element of the title.

props.name: appearance
props.description: Changes the appearance of the title.

props.name: margin
props.description: Adds top and bottom margin in rem.

props.name: className
props.description: Adds custom classes to the element.
